title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: Wasting of money for smoking and gambling is not good, if we calculate the amount of money we use in smoking and drinking for annual,  including the one we use for gambling it can be sum up to start a business offline or we use the to invest in bitcoin knowing that one day we shall recover the money. Smoking is a personal decision and some people health needs smoking to survive but I will advice who is into smoking and drinking to divert the money for bitcoin because many of us today misused some of the opportunity of investment instead they use it for something that is not profiting. Some people don't calculate well because of somethings that is not necessary, so what I want us to understand is that investment is better than drinking and smoking

comments.body: Quote from: Riginac111 on September 10, 2023, 05:22:31 PMSmoking is a personal decision and some people health needs smoking to survive How true could this be? I have never heard of someone that needs to smoke in order to survive. I only hear the bad part of smoking which damages the kidney or liver after a long time of addiction to it without taking necessary precautions to prevent that.Quotebut I will advice who is into smoking and drinking to divert the money for bitcoin because many of us today misused some of the opportunity of investment instead they use it for something that is not profiting. Not everyone knows how to trade and manage investments. If they don’t know how to do that, they will end up losing all what they have invested. Bitcoin investment could be a reliable alternative, but not everyone can still manage that without having fear in them of losing the money to market volatility.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I have a neighbor in my compound who is a chronic addict to both smoking and alcohol, and I think he gambles too, we got talking one day and while we were discussing, he pulled out a cigarette from his pocket and lighted it up, I got uncomfortable with the smell and then asked him what he benefits from constant smoking and alcohol intake, that if he gathered the money he spends on buying this things for 3 years, it could be enough to buy a piece of land ..And the response he gave me was ...."You wey no dey smoke, and you no dey drink, how many piece of land you don buy, abi no be the same me and you dey here, dey pay the same rent, I don ever come tell you say i no fit pay my house rent?"He actually picked offence, and I had to apologize to him to avoid misunderstanding, he didn't even know that I am already building my house .So their problem is that they don't listen, they never listen, when ever you ask them to stop and use that money for something much more better for their live, they first of all access you and ask you if you are better than them in any way, they ask you what have you achieved you that is not smoking or drinking, like I was supposed to start mentioning all I've achieved for them.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: One man's food is another man's poison, and as human we have our various bad habits. An addicted smoker will take a very long time before he stops smoking, this is if he wants to stop because the money that they use to buy cigarettes is cheap and sometimes people buy for them, because smokers care for his fellow smokers. It is not easy to stop something that you are addicted to like smokong,drinking,drugs and womanising. On the other hand not all smokers' are not investing or don't have an investment. There are many wealthy people that has investment everywhere that are smoking and drinking. It is just a pity that you only see the smokers that don't have an investment. You should also know that bitcoin investment is not for all but only for people who can take the risk to invest because they believe in it. Let's not criticize because we have one or two close relations that smokes or drinks knowingly or unknow to us.

comments.body: Smoking has adverse effects, it is advisable to avoid smoking because there is no benefit attached to smoking, but let's not dispute the fact that smoking being an addictive substance is very hard to stop when people indulge in it, the best way to go is to avoid smoking totally in other not to allow the penetration of the health defects that come with it, yes, the money used for smoking can be diverted to better stuffs but it is not always like that because money must be spent but the ability to spend wisely puts you ahead others.Gambling is a business for some people so I don't see everyone adhering to this advice, I think people should gamble wisely, since they have chosen that part, they should not make it a do-or-die affair in other to avoid regret.
